title: This takes the cake
body:
So, playing with a guy today that has terminal cancer. Is demoted and depressed about it in end game chat. Told by 3 people that he should kill himself and one of them I quote, said "I hope something kills you before the cancer". He's logged off now and was very distraught about it. All three were reported, nothing will be done about it as per usual.

I'm really depressed with human beings today......

replies.body:
Hey man,

Thats very unfortunate to hear. Please send in a support ticket with any information you have (screen shots are a huge bonus) and we will look into it as soon as possible.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Did you add him and tell him not to worry about it. You need to try and cheer him up if you are genually worried about him. Sometimes you got to step in and try to do something. However if he did end up killing himself i wouldn't beat myself up about it.

I already have him on my friends list. It's kind of hard to tell someone who is inveivitably going to die of cancer not to worry about it. I'm just more disappointed that people would say something like that. Sure you might feel distanced and disconnected to someone as its only text on a screen, but I think people forget there is a 'real person' on the other side of the line. 

All I can think is cancer clearly got the wrong person here

The bullies gave him cancer, 
the myth about bad (asshole) players and cancer is tru believe

have you ever heard of hunter teemo? it is about this kid that died from cancer, and the only time he wasn't in pain was when he was playing league of legends. you have to try and make him happy as well, when ever i was sick and i played games i felt like i wasn't but when i got off then i always got sick again. try to pllay some games with him and tell him to mute other players.

It should be in your best interest to not be a %%%%.

Wow you're one of those douchebags that goes Thomas Edison on someone. Regardless of whether it is punishable by law or not, it's still a disgusting to say to another person. No one deserves to die or ever be in a position to wish to be. Just keep scrolling.
Calm it, he may of just been saying that particular post is wrong, no need to get so worked up.

All i'm saying is that higher tiers don't trash talk to try to gain advantages from some silly war of words (e.g. that boring American "your mom" type of banter). They play fairly and honourably towards their opponents. The only thing that matters to them is the skill.

Faith in humanity is gone.
